QuestData.Title: Load'er Up!
QuestData.Description: Have you seen the flying machines buzzing around? That's gnomish innovation at its finest.$B$BI've long waited to get my hands on some of their technology and a perfect opportunity has presented itself. One of their recon wings crashed in the Scalding Pools, in the southwest part of the Geyser Fields.$B$BBlow this whistle near one of the crashed machines and my trusty mule, Jenny will answer. She'll follow you and carry the salvage, but you must keep her safe. She'll begin to drop the cargo if attacked.
QuestData.LogDescription: Help Jenny make her way from the crash site to Fezzix Geartwist at Taunka'le Village without losing all her cargo.
QuestData.CompletionText: Don't fail! I'm counting on you.
QuestData.RewardText: <Fezzix looks over the salvage.>$B$BJenny's a little roughed up, but she'll be fine. As for the salvage, it's a bit more... piecemeal than I had hoped, but I should be able to find a use for it. You're not off the hook yet, though. We're going to rebuild this baby.

Objectives.Objective: Return Jenny to safety without losing cargo
